General.description: Allows management and editing of channels.
General.label: MANAGE_CHANNELS

General.description: Allows management and editing of the guild.
General.label: MANAGE_GUILD

General.description: Allows for viewing of audit logs.
General.label: VIEW_AUDIT_LOG

General.description: Allows the user to go live.
General.label: STREAM

General.description: Allows guild members to view a channel.
General.label: VIEW_CHANNEL

General.description: Allows for modification of own nickname.
General.label: CHANGE_NICKNAME

General.description: Allows for modification of other users nicknames.
General.label: MANAGE_NICKNAMES

General.description: Allows management and editing of roles.
General.label: MANAGE_ROLES

General.description: Allows management and editing of webhooks.
General.label: MANAGE_WEBHOOKS

General.description: Allows management and editing of emojis.
General.label: MANAGE_EMOJIS

TextChannel.description: Allows for sending messages in a channel.
TextChannel.label: SEND_MESSAGES

TextChannel.description: Allows for deletion of other users messages.
TextChannel.label: MANAGE_MESSAGES

TextChannel.description: Links sent by users with auto-embedded.
TextChannel.label: EMBED_LINKS

TextChannel.description: Allows for uploading images and files.
TextChannel.label: ATTACH_FILES

TextChannel.description: Allows for reading of message history.
TextChannel.label: READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY

TextChannel.description: Allows the usage of custom emojis.
TextChannel.label: USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS

TextChannel.description: Allows for the addition of reactions to messages.
TextChannel.label: ADD_REACTIONS

TextChannel.description: Allows members to use slash commands in channels.
TextChannel.label: USE_SLASH_COMMANDS

TextChannel.description: Allows for deleting and archiving threads.
TextChannel.label: MANAGE_THREADS

TextChannel.description: Allows for creating and participating in threads.
TextChannel.label: USE_PUBLIC_THREADS

TextChannel.description: Allows for creating and participating in threads.
TextChannel.label: USE_PRIVATE_THREADS

VoiceChannel.description: Allows for joining of a voice channel.
VoiceChannel.label: CONNECT

VoiceChannel.description: Allows for speaking in a voice channel
VoiceChannel.label: SPEAK

VoiceChannel.description: Allows for muting members in a voice channel.
VoiceChannel.label: MUTE_MEMBERS

VoiceChannel.description: Allows for deafening of members in a channel.
VoiceChannel.label: DEAFEN_MEMBERS

VoiceChannel.description: Allows for moving of members between channels.
VoiceChannel.label: MOVE_MEMBERS

VoiceChannel.description: Allows for using vac in a channel.
VoiceChannel.label: USE_VOICE_ACTIVITY

VoiceChannel.description: Allows for requesting to speak in stage channels.
VoiceChannel.label: REQUEST_TO_SPEAK
